Methods

copy(opts, callback)

Make a WebDAV HTTP COPY request
Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object The options of request, including:
url
The url to connect
headers
The extra HTTP headers
body
The data of the request
callback function The response handler

doRequest(opts, callback)

Make a HTTP request with the specified options
Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object The options of request, including:
method
The HTTP method, default is {@code GET}
url
The url to connect
headers
The extra HTTP headers
params
The query string params
body
The data of the request
callback function The response handler
Source:
  • xhr.js, line 311
